CustomField.description: (Ability to rapidly learn new skills and behaviors in response to changing and rising circumstances and/or challenges, and changing one's actions when doing teamwork with coworkers to ensure the success of a project. People with adaptability skills are flexible. It is important because it promotes growth within a role.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ability to rapidly learn new skills and behaviors in response to changing and rising circumstances and/or challenges, and changing one's actions when doing teamwork with coworkers to ensure the success of a project. People with adaptability skills are flexible, it is important because it promotes growth within a role.
CustomField.label: Adaptability
